short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of to-do lists? Focusly helps you cut through the noise and stay productive by focusing on one task at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Focusly and simplify your workflow without feeling overwhelmed. It is the ultimate minimalist productivity extension for task management and time boxing. Manage tasks efficiently, stay on track and get things done.
